quiz.title: Homomyms , exercise 2
quiz.instruction: Fill in the blank with the correct option

mcq_text.negative_feedback:
I ate two muffins for breakfast.
Too - in excess, in addition or also
Two - the number two (2)
To - expressing motion or relating to an object

Clean the fridge then the stove.
Then - at that time, after that, next
Than - more or less than, comparing

mcq_text.task: _______ very nice and kind to everyone.
mcq_text.negative_feedback:
They're very nice and kind to everyone.
Their - belonging to them
There - location
They're - contraction of "they are"

mcq_text.task: Please take ______ skates with you to the rink.
mcq_text.negative_feedback:
Please take your skates with you to the rink.
Your - belonging to you
You're is a contraction of the words "you are"

We're excited to go on vacation.
We're - contraction of "we are"
Were - plural past
Where - referring to a place

She doesn't live here anymore.
Here - place
Hear - perceive sound
